REACT_APP_BG_COLOR.description: Determines the background color of the app

REACT_APP_LOGO_SRC.description: Determines the source of the spined logo displayed in the app

DEPLOYMENT_PLATFORM.description: Determines the deployment platform of the app

REACT_APP_MAIN_TEXT.template: This is an example of a create-react-app application that is deployed on {{DEPLOYMENT_PLATFORM}} and configured with Configu
REACT_APP_MAIN_TEXT.description: Determines the main text displayed in the app

REACT_APP_LINK_HREF.description: Determines the href of the link displayed in the app

REACT_APP_LINK_TEXT.description: Determines the text of the link displayed in the app
